snippet: For Rod Olsen,  New Hampshire was the Wrigley Field of politics, the iconic place where political junkies have to go at least once in their lives.
abstract: For Rod Olsen,  New Hampshire was the Wrigley Field of politics, the iconic place where political junkies have to go at least once in their lives.

headline.main: Santorum Supporter Gets a Taste of the Big Leagues
